title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 242.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 242.4 - Location

State Regulations
(a) Records shall be made available at the main office of the agency, which is located at: Insurance Department

One Commerce Plaza

Albany, NY 12257
(b) Whenever practicable, records shall be made available at a regional office most convenient to a data subject. The regional office is located at: New York City Office
25 Beaver Street

New York, NY 10004

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
242.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
